content:
ImageOrientation Enum

Definition

Specifies how multiple images are arranged in a single image file.

In this Article

public enum ImageOrientation
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ImageOrientation

Remarks

The ImageOrientation values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

Horizontal

Images are arranged horizontally in the multiple-image file.
Vertical

Images are arranged vertically in the multiple-image file.
